title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: "If I were a woman of childbearing age, I would reconsider starting a family with a vaccinated partner!"Prof. Dr. Arne Burkhardt, a German pathologist, presents an unsettling slide show revealing that in vaccinated males, the spike protein from the COVID vaccine has entirely replaced their sperm - http://www.freedomsphoenix.com/Article/349897-2023-09-05-if-i-were-a-woman-of-childbearing-age-id-reconsider.htm.Watch the video.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: In addition to finding out your genotype compatibility, you now also need to ask your partner;"Hey, did you get the COVID shots?"Partner - "yes''"Sorry, this relationship cannot work"

comments.author: paxmao
comments.body: The main problem that females in fertile age have about having children fall in these cathegories:1 Finding a responsible partner if they wish to.2 Financing the huge costs of maternity3 Continuing their professional career.4 Simply  not liking motherhoodWhat I can assure you is that females are absolutely tired of middle aged men telling them what they should or should not do regarding their lives, their families and their lifestyle. Particularly those like you who feel they have the "God given right" to do so.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I am not a doctor, but I am pretty sure that is not how vaccines work.How is a vaccine going to replace the production of sperm in men anyways? Also, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive. This sounds rather like a thread of theory after other theories without any scientific meaning.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMI am not a doctor, but I am pretty sure that is not how vaccines work.How is a vaccine going to replace the production of sperm in men anyways? Also, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive. This sounds rather like a thread of theory after other theories without any scientific meaning.   The covid vaccines are not vaccines. They are called vaccines because they are administered the same way vaccines are.If you want scientific meaning for this, peruse the many videos from as long as 3 years ago, that were put up by Del Bigtree of The Highwire - https://www.bitchute.com/channel/okiFK5CwQrZS/. A I have said in the past, even though Del isn't a doctor, he has a lot of medical knowledge. But he DOES have on his shows, dozens of doctors and other professionals who will show you what is really going on with the non-vaccine covid shots.

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMI am not a doctor, but I am pretty sure that is not how vaccines work.How is a vaccine going to replace the production of sperm in men anyways?It isn't. Like everything BADecker posts, this is complete bullshit: Claims that Covid-19 vaccines destroy sperm cells are falseQuote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMAlso, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive.Here's a post I made almost exactly two years ago:Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 23, 2021, 09:52:16 AMYou said I would die 2 years after my first vaccine. Now it's 2-3 years from now? What about the third shot the FDA have now said I can get soon? Surely three shots speeds up the dying process compared to just one? Shouldn't I be dead already?Just trying to figure out the best time to donate all my bitcoin to vaccine research, you know?I was supposed to already be dead then. I was definitely supposed to be dead by now! I've also lost count of how many vaccines I've had since then! I think I'm up to 5 or even 6 COVID shots by now. And flu shots, of course. And a couple other ones relevant to my line of work.So maybe it's another two years before I'm dead? I must admit, I'm getting tired from chasing these moving goalposts all over the place!

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on September 06, 2023, 04:06:11 PMIf I were a woman of childbearing ageWe're all thankful you're not... last thing we need is a bunch of little badeckers copy-pasting conspiratardery all over this forum.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 07, 2023, 05:57:20 PMQuote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMI am not a doctor, but I am pretty sure that is not how vaccines work.How is a vaccine going to replace the production of sperm in men anyways?It isn't. Like everything BADecker posts, this is complete bullshit: Claims that Covid-19 vaccines destroy sperm cells are falseQuote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMAlso, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive.Here's a post I made almost exactly two years ago:Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 23, 2021, 09:52:16 AMYou said I would die 2 years after my first vaccine. Now it's 2-3 years from now? What about the third shot the FDA have now said I can get soon? Surely three shots speeds up the dying process compared to just one? Shouldn't I be dead already?Just trying to figure out the best time to donate all my bitcoin to vaccine research, you know?I was supposed to already be dead then. I was definitely supposed to be dead by now! I've also lost count of how many vaccines I've had since then! I think I'm up to 5 or even 6 COVID shots by now. And flu shots, of course. And a couple other ones relevant to my line of work.So maybe it's another two years before I'm dead? I must admit, I'm getting tired from chasing these moving goalposts all over the place! The Harvard School of Medicine did a long study... about 12 years long. It was a recent one. It showed that less than 1% of vaccine adverse effects were reported to VAERS (the CDC). The reports to VAERS of covid vaxx deaths is ... well, let's look it up where it can easily be found... https://openvaers.com/covid-data.Not only are there a lot of covid vaxx deaths, but there are so many illnesses and injuries from them that the count is staggering. And all of that is less than 1%. The interesting thing is that we don't know how much less than 1%, but it might be only 0.1%. Check it at https://openvaers.com/faq/what-is-underreporting-and-why-it-matters.So, the fact of the matter is that you either received from batches that weren't as strong as some others, or you are still a walking time-bomb. Get a few more shots, and laugh about it until you keel over.Remember one thing... placebo effect. You can look up the records of such, that suggest that as much as 32% of people are cured by placebo effect. So, stay strong in your belief. It might be the only thing keeping you alive.

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Damn, moving those goalposts again!? Are they on wheels?

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMAlso, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive. This sounds rather like a thread of theory after other theories without any scientific meaning.   I never got the vaccination, not because I didn't want to, but because it was never available when the virus was at its worst. When it arrives, you'll have to endure a long day before being vaccinated. Staying in queue to collect a vaccine may result in interaction with an infected person whose symptoms do not manifest immediately after infection. Taking or not taking the vaccine does not result in a death sentence as some claim.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Ndabagi01 on September 07, 2023, 07:43:16 PMQuote from: Hispo on September 07, 2023, 05:10:54 PMAlso, were not people around here saying that people who took the shot would inevitably die in less than 2 years or something like it? It has been almost 3 years and people I know who took the vaccine is still alive. This sounds rather like a thread of theory after other theories without any scientific meaning.   I never got the vaccination, not because I didn't want to, but because it was never available when the virus was at its worst. When it arrives, you'll have to endure a long day before being vaccinated. Staying in queue to collect a vaccine may result in interaction with an infected person whose symptoms do not manifest immediately after infection. Taking or not taking the vaccine does not result in a death sentence as some claim.I agree with your statement that taking the vaccine doesn’t mean you will or will not die from covid (or the vax). All taking the vaccine means is that you were slightly better than average protected from covid for a couple weeks and then your immune system is forever compromised to defend against covid naturally as well as those who haven’t been vaccinated. As for the long term effects of mRNA being injected into your body, we’ll have to wait and see with the next generation. All I know is that the vaccine didn’t do what it was supposed to do and plenty of people knew this, but were censored from sharing concerns with the sheep.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on September 06, 2023, 04:06:11 PM"If I were a woman of childbearing age, I would reconsider starting a family with a vaccinated partner!"Prof. Dr. Arne Burkhardt, a German pathologist, presents an unsettling slide show revealing that in vaccinated males, the spike protein from the COVID vaccine has entirely replaced their sperm - http://www.freedomsphoenix.com/Article/349897-2023-09-05-if-i-were-a-woman-of-childbearing-age-id-reconsider.htm.Watch the video.What a scary claim!Although I was not vaccinated, but the claim that vaccine will replace sperms of a grown up adult is not only false but laughable. Come to think of it, is sperms produced right from the day on one's birth and stored in their numbers. If yes, it means sperms can be replaced. But if sperms is being produced by the body as it grows, it means the sperms that met the covid-19 vaccination might likely all being released and new ones produced in the body.There has been so many stories about covid-19 vaccines. This one is post vaccine rumour, I wonder what it intend to achieve.

Come to think of it, is sperms produced right from the day on one's birth and stored in their numbers. If yes, it means sperms can be replaced. But if sperms is being produced by the body as it grows, it means the sperms that met the covid-19 vaccination might likely all being released and new ones produced in the body.There has been so many stories about covid-19 vaccines. This one is post vaccine rumour, I wonder what it intend to achieve. Jabut, think of not having to use contraceptives any longer.

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 07, 2023, 08:54:58 PMAs for the long term effects of mRNA being injected into your body, we’ll have to wait and see with the next generation.Oh, it's the next generation now? So I'm not going to die 2 years ago/now/in another 2 years/some other made up bullshit? Now it's going to be the next generation? Oh, and whatever happened to the 5G mind control nanobots in the vaccine? When are they being activated?

comments.author: tvbcof
comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 08, 2023, 04:58:06 AMQuote from: OgNasty on September 07, 2023, 08:54:58 PMAs for the long term effects of mRNA being injected into your body, we’ll have to wait and see with the next generation.Oh, it's the next generation now? So I'm not going to die 2 years ago/now/in another 2 years/some other made up bullshit? Now it's going to be the next generation?Certain of us considered it a potential issue for the designer genetics to transcribe into the native DNA of the victim's cells.  Only later was that demonstrated to occur, and via a rather clever mechanism.  To my knowledge only the long-in-development biowarfare agent that Pfizer slapped their label on was studied and only in vitro with HEC cell lines.  I'm sure that many parties have evaluated what the behavior in germ cells might be, but nobody is going to make that kind of work public if they want to continue to work in the field (or probably even stay alive.)Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 08, 2023, 04:58:06 AMOh, and whatever happened to the 5G mind control nanobots in the vaccine? When are they being activated?Electromagnetic methods probably are being used for population management to some degree in an actual production mode here and there rather than just for experimental purposes, but I would expect things to really ramp up to the full potential  some time after the ferritin base 'universal' series of injects go in.  https://www.thelastamericanvagabond.com/new-modrna-ferritin-nano-injection/As always, it's worth noting that this guy does notate a majority of what he talks about (scientific papers, articles from the scientism rags, etc.)  The links are below the platforms that he uses.  Also I would note that it looks like some of the 'universal' injects might be coming right up.  Looks like what Biden might be talking about when he says they have a new covaids vaccine 'that works' and will be 'recommended' for everyone.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: RNA does not change DNA.end of debate,,but if you want a conspiracy sounding answerthey chose RNA based vaccine because they know the body breaks it down after time and only affects the cells around the injection site.. and its not permanent, so they can sell booster shots. #capitalism

Nobody I know who was unvaccinated had any issues, although I do know a few people who got the jab and had complications that involved hospitalizations. It was the vaccinated trying to scare the unvaccinated with threats of death and being outcasted from society. Not the other way around. I couldn’t care less what poison you put in your body. As for 5G mind control… I think you put the tin foil hat on wrong.

comments.author: tvbcof
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 08, 2023, 09:57:22 PMQuote from: o_e_l_e_o on September 08, 2023, 04:58:06 AM... Oh, and whatever happened to the 5G mind control nanobots in the vaccine? When are they being activated?... As for 5G mind control… I think you put the tin foil hat on wrong.   (2016) Genetically engineered 'Magneto' protein remotely controls brain and behaviour  https://archive.li/PgVlw  (2017) Flipping a Switch Inside the Head  https://archive.li/BJVTHI do peruse the developments in technology which is why I get suspicious about certain things.  Often before there is more than circumstantial evidence of a plan or scheme.  Logically speaking, vast sums of money and effort are not normally dedicated to the study of a technology for which there are no plans or potential to put into use at some point.  I can think of 'dual-use' for almost any technology, but it's a huge and obviously misguided leap of faith to 'know' that such technologies will only be use for 'good' purposes by 'benevolent' forces.
